description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet communities. His work spans various domains, including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like internet fragmentation, innovation practices, and sustainable collaboration. He emphasizes the importance of aligning values, breaking down silos, and embracing diversity in both digital and physical ecosystems.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to transform education and foster inclusive internet communities. His work spans ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design, emphasizing value alignment and diversity in digital and physical spaces.
